borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in an increased sense of being&nbsp; overbearing and a harmful loss of outlook and overshadowing to neighbouring occupiers. The outbuilding may also increase the level of coming and goings, visitors and activity to the site, impacting the immediate area and therefore constitutes unneighbourly development and is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Local Plan: (September 2024)<o:p></o:p></p></div>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">The principle of introducing a self-contained outbuilding of&nbsp;primary residential use within the garden setting of the subject site is not supported. The application has failed to demonstrate that the outbuilding will remain ancillary to the main dwelling. The proposal therefore represents an&nbsp;inappropriate and uncharacteristic residential form in a rear garden setting&nbsp;which results in harm to the character and context of the area.&nbsp; As such, the proposal is contrary to:&nbsp;</span></p><div><p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span pt="" sans="">- National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023)</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span pt="" sans="" style="line-height:107%">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);</span></span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span pt="" sans="">- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Local Plan: (September 2024)&nbsp;</span></p></div><br data-cke-eol="1">
description: Construction of a single storey rear outbuilding for a use ancillary to the main dwelling
